Pre-Game Insights: Imad Wasim and Mohammed Amir, who had earlier announced their retirements, are back on the national team for the Pakistan vs. New Zealand T20I series.
Haris Rauf has missed a berth due to his injury which he incurred during the PSL 2024.
Michael Bracewell will lead the New Zealand team. New Zealand will be competing with a second-string squad.
Pakistan Vs New Zealand Series, 1st T20I: 1st T20I: Thursday, 18 April 2024, starts at 8:00 PM IST at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium, Rawalpindi
Where to watch Pakistan vs New Zealand,: Unfortunately, there will not be live broadcast on any TV channel of the Pakistan vs New Zealand, 1st T20I in India.
Where will Pakistan vs New Zealand, 1st: The Pakistan vs New Zealand, 1st T20I will be streamed live in India on the FanCode app and website.
Squads:
Pakistan: Babar Azam (c), Abrar Ahmed, Azam Khan, Fakhar Zaman, Iftikhar Ahmed, Imad Wasim, Abbas Afridi, Mohammad Rizwan, Mohammad Amir, Irfan Khan, Naseem Shah, Saim Ayub, Shadab Khan, Shaheen Afridi, Usama Mir, Usman Khan, Zaman Khan
New Zealand: Michael Bracewell (c), Finn Allen, Mark Chapman, Josh Clarkson, Jacob Duffy, Dean Foxcroft, Ben Lister, Cole McConchie, Adam Milne, Jimmy Neesham, Will Oâ€™Rourke, Tim Robinson, Ben Sears, Tim Seifert, Ish Sodhi
